name: Jugunu Singh
description: I build websites and solve problems. Frontend or backend - I enjoy turning ideas into real digital products that work.

services.name: Frontend Development (Next.js, React.js)
services.description: Create stunning, high-performance web applications using modern frontend technologies like React.js and Next.js. From dynamic interfaces to server-rendered applications, I deliver seamless user experiences tailored to your needs.

services.name: Backend Development (Express.js)
services.description: Deliver robust and scalable backend solutions using Express.js, a fast and minimalist Node.js framework for building APIs and server-side applications efficiently.

services.name: Best Performance
services.description: Develop high-performance websites and web applications to ensure fast loading times, smooth user experiences, and optimal resource usage.

services.name: Responsive Design
services.description: Create responsive and adaptive frontend designs that work seamlessly across all devices, including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

services.name: Website Development
services.description: Transform your design into a fully functional, high-performance website with clean code and optimal usability.

services.name: SEO Optimization
services.description: Expert SEO optimization services designed to improve your website's search engine rankings, drive organic traffic, and enhance online visibility with tailored strategies and proven techniques.

project.title: Project
project.desctiption: Some of the projects that I've worked on to completion with some of the technologies

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Chat with me through some of the contacts you can call to get acquainted.

contents.name: causalfunnel
contents.description: Built two full-featured Shopify apps from scratch – ABTest (for price, product, and discount testing) and Survey App (for collecting customer feedback), both live on the Shopify App Store, empowering merchants with data-driven decision-making tools. Integrated Shopify APIs, webhooks, and Polaris UI to ensure seamless store connectivity, real-time updates, and a native admin dashboard experience. Additionally worked as a WordPress Developer, building and customizing dynamic websites using Elementor, aligned with client branding and SEO best practices.

contents.name: Foozy
contents.description: During my Journey at Foozy, I developed a real-time order management system, integrated a web push notification system, built a menu management system, and created an analytics dashboard. I also implemented Cloudinary CDN, automated stock resets, and tracked transactions, improving performance, efficiency, and user engagement across the platform.

contents.name: Tailblaze
contents.description: During my internship at TailBlaze, I developed a responsive landing page using React JS, built a Shopify e-commerce site, and integrated Mailchimp for email management. I also added Google Analytics for tracking website traffic and user behavior, enhancing data-driven decision-making and platform performance.

about.title: About
about.description: Hi, I’m Jugunu Singh, a passionate Full Stack Developer with a year of experience working with the MERN stack. I’ve contributed to building web applications like admin dashboards, landing pages, and real-time systems. My journey began with a love for creating user-friendly interfaces, and now I’m all about crafting dynamic, scalable solutions. I’m skilled in tools like React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS, and enjoy challenges like data visualization and optimizing performance.
